description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Llangynwyd parish, with illustrations" Author: EVANS, Thomas C. - of Llangynwyd, called Cadrawd Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.dd.3." Page: 6 Place of Publishing: Llanelly Date of Publishing: 1887 Publisher: “Llanelly and County Guardian” Office Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001179125 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
